mapper.update:
update shop_order set
addr_realname=#{addr_realname},
addr_phone=#{addr_phone},
addr_city=#{addr_city},
address=#{address},
status=#{status},
express_title=#{express_title},
express_name=#{express_name},
express_num=#{express_num},
order_id = #{order_id} where order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.select: select t1.addtime, order_total, total_price, coupon_id, coupon_price,freight_price, pay_way, addr_realname, addr_phone, addr_city, address, ip_address, user_ip, t1.order_id, status, t1.user_id, t2.username, t2.phone, express_title, express_name, express_num from shop_order t1 left join shop_user t2 on t1.user_id=t2.user_id where order_id=#{order_id}

select count(1) from shop_order t1 left join shop_user t2 on t1.user_id=t2.user_id where 1=1
and (SELECT COUNT(1) from shop_order_detail sd WHERE status=#{status} and sd.order_id=t1.order_id)>0
order by t1.addtime desc
